list.name: Changes
list.comment: Recepie state had been moved from Controller class to ConsoleClient class. A server must save or read/ provide the data. Temporary states on a web side. ConsoleClient saveRecepie() method had been renamed from saveRecepieFile. An user shouldn't know how a server store the data. Controller.saveRecepie() method had been renamed from trySaveRecepie(). saveRecepie() doesn't have additional checks and garantee recepie save beside exceptions.

task.summary: Controller - needless variables had been removed. currentRecepie variable had been moved from trySaveReceipe to the Controller class. ConsoleClient - saveRecepieToFile and assignStorageFileNameAndDirectory methods had been added.

Controller.getAllRecepies refactoring. 1) toString() methods had been added to classes: Product, Tool, Recepie, RecepieStep, Action. 2) ReceiptsReaderFromFile.returnListOfRecepies method correction. 3) ConsoleClient.printAllRecepies() method had been added 4) Runner printAllRecepies method had been added

Recepie state had been moved from Controller class to ConsoleClient class. A server must save or read/ provide the data. Temporary states on a web side. ConsoleClient saveRecepie() method had been renamed from saveRecepieFile. An user shouldn't know how a server store the data. Controller.saveRecepie() method had been renamed from trySaveRecepie(). saveRecepie() doesn't have additional checks and garantee recepie save beside exceptions.
